title: Amend a Government Contract
description: A vendor and a government agency need to amend an existing contract to extend its duration.

tasks.description: Locate the existing contract in the contract management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The contract manager finds the correct contract.

tasks.description: Draft a contract amendment document outlining the new end date.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager creates a formal amendment.

tasks.description: Route the amendment for signature by both the vendor and the authorized government official.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager sends the amendment for electronic signature.
